model.metadata: CREATE VIEW info ( name string PRIMARY KEY, party varchar(50), birthday varchar(50), gender varchar(50), description varchar(50), twitterid varchar(12) ) AS SELECT name, party, birthday, gender, description, twitterid FROM (EXEC restws.invokeHttp(action=>'GET', endpoint=>'/api/v2/role?current=true&role_type=senator', stream=>'TRUE')) AS f, XMLTABLE('/root/objects' PASSING JSONTOXML('root', f.result) COLUMNS name string PATH 'person/name/text()', party string PATH 'party/text()', birthday string PATH 'person/birthday/text()', gender string PATH 'person/gender/text()', description string PATH 'description/text()', twitterid string PATH 'person/twitterid/text()') AS A;
